Articles.Content:
Hey there, bought the game about two weeks ago and have been enjoying the hell out of it since. Figured I'd make a forum account and say hi.

And this.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/d_A9Tp4daeo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

"And he sticks the landing! The crowd goes wild!"

(Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) )

Welcome! Truly, the next Tom Cruise.

Mission Impossible: Minmus Protocol.
Epic slow mo backflip! Welcome to the forums, cheenomatic.
Hahah I wonder what would have happened if you didn't hit the R key and see if he lands on his feet, eventually ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> Hahah I wonder what would have happened if you didn't hit the R key and see if he lands on his feet, eventually ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I did that the first time and yes, he lands on his feet and proceeds to bounce and skip across the surface of Mimnus like a rubber ball. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thank you all for the warm welcome. I do tend to upload more videos to my youtube channel at [http://www.youtube.com/cheenomatic](https://www.youtube.com/cheenomatic)
